trans-unit.source: CustomContentState enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.
trans-unit.target: CustomContentState ativa a capacidade de navegar pelas diferentes Estados de um único conjunto de conteúdo de origem sem recarregar o conteúdo de origem para cada navegação subsequente.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>não armazena uma instância de um objeto do conteúdo no histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>cria uma nova instância do objeto do conteúdo sempre que é utilizado com o histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento é concebido para evitar o consumo de memória excessiva quando grandes quantidades e grande peças de conteúdo estão a ser utilizadas.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o estado do conteúdo não é memorizado de navegação de um para a seguinte.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] fornece a capacidade de associar uma peça de estado personalizado a entrada do histórico de navegação de uma peça de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from CustomContentState.
trans-unit.target: Estado personalizada que está associado uma entrada do histórico de navegação deve ser uma classe que derive CustomContentState.

trans-unit.source: You associate a CustomContentState object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - Calling **AddBackEntry**: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Associar um objecto CustomContentState com uma entrada do histórico de navegação, utilizando um as seguintes técnicas: - chamar **AddBackEntry**:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> when one of the following events are raised: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - By implementing <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it.
trans-unit.target: -Definir <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Quando um dos seguintes eventos são gerados:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- através da implementação <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>na classe que pretende que o estado personalizado para ser associada ao mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se chama o **AddBackEntry** método, deve processar o **Navigating** eventos ou implementar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] checks to see if a custom CustomContentState object is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Quando a entrada do histórico de navegação é direcionada, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] verifica se um objecto CustomContentState personalizado é associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: If so, it calls <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A> to allow the custom CustomContentState object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation.
trans-unit.target: Se Sim, aquele invoca <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A>para permitir que o objecto CustomContentState personalizado aplicar o estado que é memorizado do painel de navegação anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A>

trans-unit.source: A custom CustomContentState class can override <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A> to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the CustomContentState object is associated.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir uma classe personalizada do CustomContentState <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>para alterar o nome que aparece para a entrada do histórico de navegação à qual o objecto CustomContentState está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value that <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A> returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: O valor que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>devolve está visível a partir do painel de navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dos navegadores de vários ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from CustomContentState must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>, and optionally implement <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que deriva de CustomContentState tem de ser serializável, o que significa que tem de ser aumentado, pelo menos, com <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>e, opcionalmente, implementam <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don’t want the content to be retained in memory.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Ao armazenar informações de estado de conteúdo personalizado, não é possível armazenar quaisquer referências para a instância da página para o qual são memorizar o estado, se não pretendem que o conteúdo a ser mantido na memória.

trans-unit.source: This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior.
trans-unit.target: Isto impede que [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] solte a instância de página e defeats o objetivo do comportamento de histórico de navegação predefinido.

trans-unit.source: If you must do this, consider using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Se tem de fazer isto, considere utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The name for the content that is stored in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: O nome para o conteúdo que é armazenado no histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The value of JournalEntryName is displayed from <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: É apresentado o valor de JournalEntryName de <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>, e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the host navigator, including <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Entradas armazenadas no back e histórico de navegação de avanço estão normalmente disponíveis do back e reencaminhar pendente botões de navegação no painel de navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] do navegador de anfitrião, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: JournalEntryName is the <xref:System.String> value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list.
trans-unit.target: JournalEntryName é o <xref:System.String>valor que é apresentado numa navegação histórico lista pendente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: JournalEntryName does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.
trans-unit.target: JournalEntryName não tem de ser substituído; Se não, as peças de dados seguintes são utilizadas para construir automaticamente um nome de entrada de histórico de navegação, por ordem de precedência:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual - o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> name of the content that is stored in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>nome do conteúdo que é armazenado no histórico de navegação.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para aplicar o estado para um conjunto de conteúdo quando ocorre a navegação.

trans-unit.source: Replay is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object is navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Reprodução é chamada quando um item no histórico de navegação que tenha um associados <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto é utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the abstract <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> class, Replay must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base Replay method.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar a derivação do abstrato <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>classe, reprodução tem de ser substituído, embora a implementação de substituição necessário só é possível chamar o método de reprodução de base.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> owned by the navigator responsible for the content to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> is being applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> pertencentes ao navegador responsável pelo conteúdo para o qual este <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> está a ser aplicada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> that specifies how the content to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> is being applied was navigated to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> que especifica como o conteúdo para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> está a ser aplicada foi direcionada para.
